tasks.title: Start a new project
tasks.text: Set up a new React project using a build tool like Create React App. Create the project structure, configure dependencies and establish a development environment.

tasks.title: Component Design and Structure
tasks.text: Plan and create the main components of the application, outlining their structure and relationships.

tasks.title: State Management Integration
tasks.text: Implement a state management solution, such as Redux or the Context API, to handle the application's global state. Define and manage the data flow to ensure efficient communication between components.

tasks.title: Styling and Responsiveness
tasks.text: Apply styles to the components using SCSS. Ensure that the application is responsive, providing a consistent user experience across different devices and screen sizes.
